mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_login_id, user_email, user_password, user_name, user_profile_image, user_status, user_birthday, rank_id, dept_id, user_created_at, user_updated_at, remember_token, remember_token_expired FROM User
SELECT user_login_id, user_email, user_name FROM User WHERE user_name = #{name} AND user_email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM User WHERE remember_token = #{value} AND remember_token_expired > NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User ( user_login_id, user_email, user_password, user_name, user_profile_image, user_status, user_birthday, rank_id, dept_id ) VALUES ( #{userLoginId}, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userProfileImage}, #{userStatus}, #{userBirthday}, #{rankId}, #{deptId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET user_email = #{userEmail}, user_password = #{userPassword}, user_name = #{userName}, user_profile_image = #{userProfileImage}, user_status = #{userStatus}, rank_id = #{rankId}, dept_id = #{deptId} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE User SET remember_token = NULL, remember_token_expired = NULL WHERE user_id = #{userId}
